mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS postId, c.id, c.contents, c.rdate, c.stdn_id AS stdnId, s.name as stdnName, s.img as stdnImg FROM mrk m JOIN mrk_comm c ON m.id = c.post_id JOIN stdn s ON c.stdn_id = s.id WHERE m.id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.rdate DESC
SELECT id, post_id AS postId, content, rdate, stdn_id AS stdnId FROM mrk_comm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mrk_comm (id, post_id, contents, rdate, stdn_id) VALUES (mrk_comm_seq.NEXTVAL,#{postId},#{contents},TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy.MM.dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{stdnId})
